restore-on-scroll.desc: Restores the zoomed item on scroll action

manual.desc: Disable automatic zoom feature. Must be done manually via show/hide methods

scale.desc: Allows scalling the zoomed item with mouse wheel

initial-scale.desc: When scale property is set this is the value for the initial scale

scale-text.desc: Allows scalling the zoomed item's text with mouse wheel

initial-scale-text.desc: When scale-text property is set this is the value for the initial text scale

no-center.desc: Keep text from being centered aligned when zooming

no-wheel-scale.desc: Turns off ability for user to scale

no-esc-close.desc: Turns off ability for user to use ESC to cancel scale (must be done with code)

before-zoom.desc: Trigger when default slotted content is about to be zoomed

zoomed.desc: Trigger when default slotted content is zoomed

before-restore.desc: Trigger when default slotted content is about to be restored

restored.desc: Trigger when default slotted content is restored

scale.desc: Trigger when the setScale method is called

scale-text.desc: Trigger when the setScaleText method is called

toggle.desc: Toggles between zoom and restore methods
